title: [Medicine] Vitamin B12 is a key player in cellular reprogramming and tissue regeneration, finds a new study in mice. Vitamin B12 supplementation shows potential in speeding up tissue repair in a model of ulcerative colitisâ€”an observation that points to potential new treatments for inflammatory diseases.

[Medicine] Common oral infections, periodontal diseases and caries, are associated with inflammatory metabolic profiles related to an increased risk of cardiometabolic diseases. Oral infections may partially explain unhealthy lipid profiles and is a significant preventable risk factor for systemic health.
